sn34.16:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na samadhismim abhiniharakusalo.
sn34.16:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim abhiniharakusalo hoti, na samadhismim samapattikusalo.
sn34.16:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim abhiniharakusalo.
sn34.16:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim abhiniharakusalo ca.
